title: Black bean tacos
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 (400g) tin black beans, rinsed and drained', '200g salsa verde (green salsa)', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '6 taco shells', '60g grated Cheddar with chilli peppers (optional)', '1 tomato, diced', '1 avocado, sliced', '60g finely sliced lettuce']
